resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158021</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158021</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Project English Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt-Englisch-Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour de l'Anglais de Projet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia Do Inglês Do Projeto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno Di Inglese Di Progetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική ημέρα προγράμματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día Del Inglés Del Proyecto</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a guideline for teachers to set up an English Day in their School (For countries where English is a foreign Language) This particular one is based in Israel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">activities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Korrekturlinie, damit Lehrer 
einen englischen Tag in ihrer Schule aufstellen (für Länder, in 
denen Englisch eine Fremdsprache ist), das, dieses bestimmte man in 
Israel basiert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une directive pour que les professeurs 
installent un jour anglais à leur école (pour des pays où l'anglais
est une langue étrangère) que celle-ci particulière est basée en 
Israel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um guideline para que os professores 
ajustem acima um dia inglês em sua escola (para os países onde o 
inglês é uma língua extrangeira) que esta particular é baseado em 
Israel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una guida di riferimento affinchè gli 
insegnanti installi un giorno inglese a loro scuola (per i paesi in 
cui l'inglese è una lingua straniera) che questa particolare è 
basata nell'Israele</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια οδηγία για τους δασκάλους για να 
οργανώσει μια αγγλική ημέρα στο σχολείο τους (για τις χώρες όπου
τα αγγλικά είναι μια ξένη γλώσσα) Αυτός ο ιδιαίτερος ένας
είναι βασισμένος στο Ισραήλ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una guía de consulta para que los 
profesores instalen un día inglés en su escuela (para los países 
donde está un idioma el inglés extranjero) que éste determinado se 
basa en Israel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activités</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">progetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρόγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δραστηριότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividades</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>

version:3.0

            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entry>ILMoE3159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Rural English Education Department</string>

        </rights>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>

          <taxonPath>

        <classification>

          </taxonPath>

  </description>
